summary: Build an online bookstore website ("Chapter One" / Siddheswar Books Store) starting with a homepage/landing page featuring navigation (Home, Categories, Bestsellers, Cart), a hero section, and a trending books grid with Add to Cart buttons.
architectural_notes: Static front-end webpage (HTML + external style.css) using Google Fonts (Poppins).
